Hi,

i Play on Xbox one since Release. Then After re Release from the new Edition (enhanced edition) i Play on xbox one x.  I Love this Game. But the biggest Problem in my oppinion what this Game has on Console is the Performance Problem. The Game runs fine if you do Small Things. But its Running with realy 3 - 5 Frames in Second if you want do a real Space Mission. Building a big rocket is Not the Problem. I Understand, why we Need rockets with 500 parts+... (Framerate is there around 8-15) But we Need multiple vessels. If you want to land a Medium size (60-100 Parts) Second vessel in the same area near to another then is the framerate Going extrem down (5-10). The next issue Whats going along with it is that we can‘t use the tools on the vessel because of the low perfomance, the game don‘t recognizes the imput from your buttons.

 

the Game is Going down When you want to Land a third vessel...

 

same in space. Its not possible to Build a solid Space Station with three Moduls or more. I made one with three and it is Not realy big.. the Performance is at 3 fps. And you can‘t use Any Tools on it.

You can Show me via Stream how you Build the Space Station in the background on your „game Start picture“ in the store on xbox ^^ You Show use something what we can’t Build...

this Game has no difference in Performance from the normal Xbox one to Xbox one X (that Show‘s the Problem) there is a Performance fix needed in my eyes on console. And a buff for ps4 pro and xbox one x compared to the normal one.

 

But, i know this is hard work. So every fine. But in my eyes are Performance Problems and bugs the biggest Problems what Games can have and why many Players Leave. (In this case just Performance there are no game breaking bugs). Iam realy intereseted on your DLC‘s / Expansion.. But Not so...

 

i would be glad to See a Performance buff (a big one). But do what you want to do
